thread.title: David

author: David
title: David
text:
I and my wife visited Marlows in the Jewellery Quarter on Tuesday 31st January with view to purchasing diamond earrings. We had identified 6 possible shops to visit. Marlows was first on our list, and as soon as we entered we were on a hiding to nothing!!!
We were warmly welcomed by Carmen the General manager, and she immediately established what we were looking for. She was thoroughly professional in her presentation, very knowledgeable, excellent in her explanations, and in no way pushy. She knew just what we wanted to pay, and her advice was first class. Result: my wife is thrilled with her 70th birthday present.
Well done Carmen, a pleasure to deal with you, and we look forward to seeing you again in the future.
Many thanks, David Wood
